repos.name: ATM Machine
repos.description: This is a React project to simulate an ATM terminal. From the original code, I added validation, a selector for the action, as well as an error message that displays if the data is invalid.

repos.name: Ball Mover
repos.description: This is a small JavaScript program to move a div 'ball' around an area, changing size and color depending on the direction.
